openness.name: Openness to Experience
openness.description: Reflects your appreciation for art, emotion, adventure, unusual ideas, imagination, curiosity, and variety of experience

imagination.name: Imagination
imagination.description: Tendency to be creative, original, and have an active fantasy life

artistic.name: Artistic Interests
artistic.description: Appreciation of art and beauty, sensitivity to aesthetic experiences

emotionality.name: Emotionality
emotionality.description: Receptivity to emotions and emotional experiences

adventurousness.name: Adventurousness
adventurousness.description: Eagerness to try new activities, travel, and experience new things

intellect.name: Intellect
intellect.description: Love of learning, intellectual curiosity, and appreciation for complex ideas

liberalism.name: Liberalism
liberalism.description: Readiness to challenge authority, convention, and traditional values

openness.high_description: Creative, curious, open to new experiences, imaginative

conscientiousness.name: Conscientiousness
conscientiousness.description: Shows your tendency to be organized, responsible, and hardworking

self_efficacy.name: Self-Efficacy
self_efficacy.description: Confidence in your ability to accomplish things and achieve goals

orderliness.name: Orderliness
orderliness.description: Tendency to be neat, tidy, and organized

dutifulness.name: Dutifulness
dutifulness.description: Sense of moral obligation and commitment to doing what's right

achievement.name: Achievement Striving
achievement.description: Drive to achieve excellence and work hard to accomplish goals

self_discipline.name: Self-Discipline
self_discipline.description: Ability to persist at difficult or unpleasant tasks until completion

cautiousness.name: Cautiousness
cautiousness.description: Tendency to think carefully before acting and avoid making mistakes

extraversion.name: Extraversion
extraversion.description: Reflects your tendency to seek stimulation in the company of others

friendliness.name: Friendliness
friendliness.description: Warmth and affection toward others, sociability

gregariousness.name: Gregariousness
gregariousness.description: Preference for the company of others, enjoyment of crowds

assertiveness.name: Assertiveness
assertiveness.description: Tendency to be forceful, take charge, and express opinions boldly

activity.name: Activity Level
activity.description: Pace of living, energy, need for activity and stimulation

excitement.name: Excitement Seeking
excitement.description: Need for environmental stimulation, preference for exciting activities

cheerfulness.name: Cheerfulness
cheerfulness.description: Tendency to experience positive emotions and express joy

extraversion.high_description: Outgoing, energetic, assertive, seeks social stimulation

agreeableness.name: Agreeableness
agreeableness.description: Shows your tendency to be compassionate and cooperative rather than suspicious and antagonistic

trust.name: Trust
trust.description: Tendency to assume good intentions in others and believe people are honest

morality.name: Morality
morality.description: Straightforwardness, sincerity, and ingenuousness in dealing with others

altruism.name: Altruism
altruism.description: Active concern for the welfare of others, generosity and willingness to help

cooperation.name: Cooperation
cooperation.description: Dislike of confrontations, willingness to compromise to get along with others

modesty.name: Modesty
modesty.description: Tendency to be humble, self-effacing, and unpretentious

sympathy.name: Sympathy
sympathy.description: Empathy and concern for others, tendency to be moved by others' needs

neuroticism.name: Neuroticism
neuroticism.description: Reflects your tendency to experience negative emotions and psychological distress

anxiety.name: Anxiety
anxiety.description: Tendency to feel anxious, nervous, worried, and fearful

anger.name: Anger
anger.description: Tendency to feel angry, frustrated, and experience irritation

depression.name: Depression
depression.description: Tendency toward sadness, dejection, and discouragement

self_consciousness.name: Self-Consciousness
self_consciousness.description: Shyness, social anxiety, and concern about what others think

immoderation.name: Immoderation
immoderation.description: Tendency to give in to cravings and urges, difficulty resisting temptation

vulnerability.name: Vulnerability
vulnerability.description: Feeling overwhelmed by stress, inability to cope with pressure

neuroticism.high_description: Anxious, easily stressed, moody, emotionally reactive

E_I.E_description: Extraverted - Energized by external world, outgoing
E_I.I_description: Introverted - Energized by inner world, reflective

S_N.S_description: Sensing - Focus on facts, details, present reality
S_N.N_description: Intuitive - Focus on patterns, possibilities, future potential

T_F.T_description: Thinking - Make decisions based on logic and analysis
T_F.F_description: Feeling - Make decisions based on values and emotions

J_P.J_description: Judging - Prefer structure, planning, and closure
J_P.P_description: Perceiving - Prefer flexibility, spontaneity, and adaptability

high_openness.title: Creative Problem Solver
high_openness.description: Your high openness makes you excellent at thinking outside the box and finding innovative solutions to complex problems.

high_conscientiousness.title: Reliable Achiever
high_conscientiousness.description: Your conscientiousness drives you to follow through on commitments and achieve your goals with discipline and organization.

high_extraversion.title: Natural Leader
high_extraversion.description: Your extraversion makes you comfortable taking charge, inspiring others, and thriving in social environments.

high_agreeableness.title: Team Builder
high_agreeableness.description: Your agreeable nature helps you create harmony, build trust, and bring out the best in others.

low_neuroticism.title: Emotional Stability
low_neuroticism.description: Your emotional stability helps you stay calm under pressure and maintain a positive outlook even in challenging situations.

low_openness.title: Embrace New Perspectives
low_openness.description: Consider exploring new ideas, trying different approaches, and being more open to change and innovation.

low_conscientiousness.title: Develop Organization Skills
low_conscientiousness.description: Focus on building better planning habits, setting clear goals, and following through on commitments.

low_extraversion.title: Expand Social Comfort Zone
low_extraversion.description: Practice speaking up in groups, networking, and taking on more visible roles when appropriate.

low_agreeableness.title: Build Collaborative Skills
low_agreeableness.description: Work on seeing different perspectives, practicing empathy, and finding win-win solutions in conflicts.

high_neuroticism.title: Stress Management
high_neuroticism.description: Develop coping strategies for managing stress, anxiety, and emotional reactions in challenging situations.

high_extraversion_high_agreeableness.title: Social Harmonizer
high_extraversion_high_agreeableness.description: You excel at bringing people together and creating positive group dynamics.

low_extraversion_high_agreeableness.title: Supportive Listener
low_extraversion_high_agreeableness.description: You're likely to be the person others turn to for emotional support and understanding.

high_openness_high_agreeableness.title: Empathetic Innovator
high_openness_high_agreeableness.description: You combine creativity with compassion, helping others explore new possibilities.

high_conscientiousness_high_agreeablenes.title: Dependable Partner
high_conscientiousness_high_agreeablenes.description: Your reliability and consideration make you a trustworthy and caring friend or partner.
